past_courses.institution: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
past_courses.justification: Provides differential equation solutions and understanding of system dynamics required for control system time responses.
Covers fundamental control system modeling, transfer functions, and analysis methods that align with core control topics in ME3142.
Provides basic control design and feedback concepts in an engineering context, including stability and frequency response ideas.

direct_oulu_links.justification: Time and frequency response fundamentals overlap with core ME3142 topics.
Core mathematical modeling and transform methods that are prerequisites for control systems.
Direct control theory course (steady-state error, frequency response, stability).
